name: TANK BOMBER
description:
Earbeard Games is proud to present: TANK BOMBER!

You pilot a bomber aircraft that must stop the endless waves of enemy tanks, no matter the cost. Click your mouse to bomb tanks, but be careful! Missing your target or hitting landmines will cost you. 

Credits:

Howard Hogan - Game Designer
Eric Berzins - Audio Lead
Marc Pinsky - Composer + Announcer
Jason Zedlitz - Sound Designer
